PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-00342013-01-31,  DFAIT,  ,  , 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectNFB-PIPSC - Administrative and Foreign Service category and the Scientific and Professional category ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder authorizing the renewal of the COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT between the NATIONAL CAPITAL COMMISSION AND THE PUBLIC SERVICE ALLIANCE OF CANADA regarding the employees in the Bargaining Unit. This agreement is for a term of three (3) years from January 1, 2012 to December 31, 2014.
AttachmentsAttachment
